select a.* from (select ROWNUM as RNUM,b.* from (select * from qna where category = #{category} order by board_num desc)b )a where a.RNUM>=#{start} and a.RNUM<=#{end}

select a.* from (select ROWNUM as RNUM,b.* from (select * from qna where category = #{category} and board_status = #{board_status} order by board_num desc)b )a where a.RNUM>=#{start} and a.RNUM<=#{end}
select a.* from (select ROWNUM as RNUM,b.* from (select * from qna where board_status = 1 order by board_num desc)b )a where a.RNUM>=#{start} and a.RNUM<=#{end}
select a.* from (select ROWNUM as RNUM,b.* from (select * from qna where board_status = 0 order by board_num desc)b )a where a.RNUM>=#{start} and a.RNUM<=#{end}
select count(*) from qna where category = #{category}

select count(*) from qna where board_status = 1

mapper.select: select name from member where member_num=#{member_num}

mapper.update: update qna set subject = #{subject}, content = #{content} where board_num=#{board_num}
